description: This luxury condo features an open floor plan with a private balcony, great views, lots of natural light. It is centrally located near gateway shopping mall, gyms, restaurants, and coffee shops. It's 15-20 minutes away from JFK airport. Quiet and family friendly community.
name: Luxury One Bedroom Condo (Close to JFK)
review: Sharice place is really comfy and close by groceries and stores, subway that takes you straight to Manhattan. We really enjoy our stay at Sharice's place and our time un NY. I highly recommend this place for a long and short visit
